name: Renascent
description: '''Renascent''' is an [[unblack metal]] band that originated in [[Helsinki]], Finland, and the core of the band now currently reside in [[Bloomington, Indiana]]. The band has released an EP titled, ''Demon's Quest'' in 2004 and a full length titled ''Through Darkness'' in 2005. The band released their sophomore album, ''Praise of the Lord God Almighty'', on 5 November 2016. The band is openly Christian. The band has been compared to [[Dimmu Borgir]] and [[Old Man's Child]].
